Contains: Wheat. For the most accurate and updated ingredient info, always check the ingredients label on the actual product.
product_description: Dave's Killer Bread® 21 Whole Grains & Seeds bread loaf is USDA organic bread with killer taste and texture sure to amplify your next sandwich or toast creation. Each Non-GMO Project Verified bread slice is coated in Dave's signature 21 Whole Grains and Seeds mix, giving you the hearty texture and subtle sweetness you love. 6g protein, 4g fiber, 130mg ALA Omega-3 and 22g whole grains per slice. Dave's Killer Bread® has no high-fructose corn syrup, no artificial preservatives and no artificial ingredients. You can trust Dave's Killer Bread® to deliver killer taste and texture. 21 Whole Grains & Seeds sliced bread is our #1 selling loaf and just what you need for sandwiches, toast or snacks. The story of Dave’s Killer Bread® began at the Portland Farmers Market, when Dave Dahl and his nephew brought some loaves of Dave's bread to sell. For Dave, this marked the beginning of a new chapter in his life. Though he grew up in a family of bakers, his life took a different path. A path that landed him in prison for 15 years. Determined to prove his worth and make a positive impact, Dave worked tirelessly to bake breads that tasted unlike anything else on the market — packed with seeds and grains, made with only the very best organic and Non-GMO Project Verified ingredients. Dave’s Killer Bread® believes everyone is capable of greatness. One in three of the company's employee partners at their Milwaukie, OR bakery has a criminal background—but your past doesn't define your future. As a proud Second Chance Employer, Dave’s Killer Bread® truly believes everyone deserves a second chance to become a Good Seed.

product_description: Nature’s Own Perfectly Crafted® Sourdough Bread is thick-sliced, soft artisan style bread you'll be excited to sink your teeth into. This delicious bread strikes the perfect balance of soft texture and classic sourdough flavor sure to satisfy the most demanding taste buds – yours. This delicious bread recipe is made with a sourdough starter, providing that classic flavor you know and love. Additionally, with 15 slices per loaf, there’s plenty of delicious sourdough bread to make deli sandwiches, toast or new creations. Nature's Own Perfectly Crafted Sourdough Bread is a low fat food and has no artificial preservatives, colors or flavors; no high fructose corn syrup; and is a cholesterol free food. Plus, you can trust that all Perfectly Crafted products from Nature's Own are Non-GMO Project Verified. You'll feel confident serving family and friends delicious choices from Nature's Own bread, America's #1 Selling Loaf Bread Brand.*

name: Multigrain Bread-2 Pack-18 oz Per Loaf | Delicious Sandwich Bread | Dairy & Nut Free | Stern’s Bakery
short_description: STERNS BAKERY- ALWAYS FRESH ALWAYS DELICIOUS! We take great pride in our leading brand of signature pre-sliced bread. Taking gourmet breads to the next level. Our commitment to only the finest in quality breads started more than a century ago, adding a large selection of gourmet whole grain breads and challah bread to the market.

12 GRAIN BREAD! Our delicious gourmet 12 grain bread comes as a pre- sliced bread loaf loaded with grains such as rice, buckwheat, soy, linseed, sesame, millet, sunflower, wheat, rye, oat and barley. Making it easy to have a relaxed breakfast at home or take with a sandwich bread to go. Our fluffy delicious flavorful bread will keep you full until your next meal comes around.

BAKERY FRESH BREAD AT YOUR DOORSTEP! Our very tasty, fluffy sliced sandwich bread is baked fresh daily from the finest and highest quality ingredients! We hand pack each loaf of bread in a dedicated bread bag to preserve optimum quality and freshness. Our bread is also kosher certified by the OK and CRC and baked in our dairy and nut free facility.

GREAT FOR ANY HOLIDAY MEAL OR PARTY: Having a party or hosting a holiday meal? Our very yummy signature 12 grain loaf of bread is loaded with goodness and will truly enhance your party and have your guests and friends feeling very full and satisfied with their dinner.

ORDER IT TODAY! If you experience any kind of issue with this bread whether its the shipping, packaging, customer service or you just simply dont like it- please contact us- our customer service is our number one priority!

name: Rudolph's Bakery Multigrain Sourdough: Wholesome 500g Loaf for Hearty Delights!
short_description: 🌾 NUTRITIOUS MULTIGRAIN BLEND: Savor the benefits of our carefully selected mix of whole grains, including wheat, barley, and oats. Packed with fiber, vitamins, and minerals, this bread is a nutritious choice for those seeking a wholesome lifestyle.

👩‍🍳 ARTISANAL CRAFTSMANSHIP: Experience the art of baking with Rudolph's Bakery. Our master bakers meticulously prepare each batch, ensuring a consistent, high-quality product. The result? A mouthwatering, handcrafted loaf that stands out on any table.

🌞 ENERGIZING START TO YOUR DAY: Kickstart your mornings with a slice of our Multigrain Sourdough Bread. Its complex carbohydrates provide a sustained energy release, keeping you fueled throughout the day. Say goodbye to mid-morning slumps!

🚀 QUICK & EASY MEALS: Transform ordinary meals into extraordinary experiences. Whether you're making sandwiches, toasts, or creative appetizers, our bread is the perfect canvas for culinary adventures. Explore endless possibilities in your kitchen.

😋 IRRESISTIBLE FLAVOR PROFILE: Delight your taste buds with the rich, tangy flavor of our sourdough. The multigrain infusion adds depth to each bite, making it a versatile choice for both sweet and savory toppings.

🌿 ALL-NATURAL INGREDIENTS: We believe in the power of simplicity. That's why our Multigrain Sourdough Bread is made with only the finest natural ingredients, free from artificial preservatives and additives. Pure goodness in every slice!
product_description: Indulge in the perfect blend of flavor and nutrition with Rudolph's Bakery Multigrain Sourdough Bread. Our 500g artisanal loaf is a delightful fusion of wholesome goodness, crafted to elevate your culinary experience. Each bite unveils a symphony of textures, from the crusty exterior to the soft, chewy interior, creating a mouthwatering treat for every occasion.

name: Arnold Whole Grains 100% Whole Wheat Bread, Wheat Bread Free From Artificial Colors, Flavors and Preservatives, 24 oz Loaf
short_description: Whole Grain Goodness: Baked with whole grains and certified by the Whole Grain Council, Arnold Whole Grains bread provides 48g of whole grains per two slices, ensuring a nutritious start to your day

Protein-Packed Perfection: Each serving of Arnold Whole Grains 100% Whole Wheat bread offers 8g of protein and 5g of fiber per two slices, supporting digestive health while delivering the energy you need for your busy lifestyle
Supports Digestive Health: Arnold Whole Grains 100% Whole Wheat bread provides 48g of whole grains per two slices and is is free from artificial preservatives, colors, and flavors!
product_description: Product Description Discover the wholesome goodness of Arnold Bread Whole Grains 100% Whole Wheat Bread, 24 oz, a delicious and nutritious choice for your family. Baked with whole grains, this exceptional bread offers 48g of whole grains per two slices, providing a rich source of fiber that supports digestive health. With 8g of protein and 5g of fiber per two slices, it’s not just any sandwich bread; it’s a powerhouse of nutrition that elevates your meals. Free from artificial preservatives, colors, and flavors, as well as high fructose corn syrup, Arnold Bread Whole Grains 100% Whole Wheat Bread ensures you’re serving only the best. Perfect for toasting, sandwiches, or simply enjoying with butter, this versatile bread is ideal for health-conscious consumers seeking a tasty alternative to traditional white bread, wheat bread, and even keto bread. Experience the delightful taste and texture of Arnold Bread's options, that will support your lifestyle. Amazon.com Brownberry® Whole Grains 100% Whole Wheat Bread. Double wrapped for freshness. Bread perfected. 22g whole grains per slice. Good source of fiber. No high fructose corn syrup. Per 1 slice serving. 110 calories. 0g sat. fat, 0% DV. 150 mg sodium, 3% DV. 4g sugars. How to Keep Your Bread Fresh Recommended Sliced bread should be stored on the counter or in a bread box at room temperature. Bread stays fresh for up to three months wrapped in a second bag and stored in the freezer. Individual slices can be pulled out as needed. Things to Avoid Direct sunlight, heat, and moisture will cause bread to mold early. Storing bread in the refrigerator will cause the bread to dry out quickly.
